recipesJson.name: RED FANTA' STICK SOMMERTIME
recipesJson.author: nugginemoDIY
recipesJson.description: When it's summer and hot, I love to drink a little bitter soda. And one of those I love, has inspired to this mix. It's not 100% red fanta but it seems to me that I hit well. And the profile is there. If desired, add WS-30, Koolada and, or Sweetner to your liking. Have fun ... ðŸ˜‹ðŸ’¨ðŸ’¨ðŸ’¨
